Class PropertyController

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.nemerosa.ontrack.ui.controller.AbstractResourceController
      • net.nemerosa.ontrack.boot.ui.AbstractProjectEntityController
        • net.nemerosa.ontrack.boot.ui.PropertyController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/properties")
public class PropertyController
extends AbstractProjectEntityController
    UI end point for the management of properties.

    • Method Detail

      • getProperties

        @RequestMapping(value="{entityType}/{id}",
                method=GET)
public Resources<Resource<Property<?>>> getProperties(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                             ProjectEntityType entityType,
                                                                                                                             @PathVariable
                                                                                                                             ID id)
        Gets the list of properties for a given entity and for the current user.
        Parameters:
        entityType - Entity type
        id - Entity ID
        Returns:
        List of properties

      • getPropertyValue

        @RequestMapping(value="{entityType}/{id}/{propertyTypeName}/view",
                method=GET)
public Resource<Property<?>> getPropertyValue(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                             ProjectEntityType entityType,
                                                                                                                                             @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                             ID id,
                                                                                                                                             @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                             java.lang.String propertyTypeName)
        Gets the value for a given property for an entity. If the property is not set, a non-null Property is returned but is marked as empty. If the property is not opened for viewing, the call could be rejected with an authorization exception.
        Parameters:
        entityType - Type of the entity to get the edition form for
        id - ID of the entity to get the edition form for
        propertyTypeName - Fully qualified name of the property to get the form for
        Returns:
        A response that defines the property

      • getPropertyEditionForm

        @RequestMapping(value="{entityType}/{id}/{propertyTypeName}/edit",
                method=GET)
public Form getPropertyEditionForm(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                  ProjectEntityType entityType,
                                                                                                                                  @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                  ID id,
                                                                                                                                  @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                  java.lang.String propertyTypeName)
        Gets the edition form for a given property for an entity. The content of the form may be filled or not, according to the fact if the property is actually set for this entity or not. If the property is not opened for edition, the call could be rejected with an authorization exception.
        Parameters:
        entityType - Type of the entity to get the edition form for
        id - ID of the entity to get the edition form for
        propertyTypeName - Fully qualified name of the property to get the form for
        Returns:
        An edition form to be used by the client

      • editProperty

        @RequestMapping(value="{entityType}/{id}/{propertyTypeName}/edit",
                method=PUT)
 @ResponseStatus(value=ACCEPTED)
public Ack editProperty(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                        ProjectEntityType entityType,
                                                                                                                                                        @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                        ID id,
                                                                                                                                                        @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                        java.lang.String propertyTypeName,
                                                                                                                                                        @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                        com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode data)
        Edits the value of a property.
        Parameters:
        entityType - Type of the entity to edit
        id - ID of the entity to edit
        propertyTypeName - Fully qualified name of the property to edit
        data - Raw JSON data for the property value
